name: Zombie VR - A Game Made in 1 Hour
name_original: Zombie VR - A Game Made in 1 Hour
description:
Install instructions

Download and unzip "Zombie VR One Hour Challenge - Desktop.rar"
For any PC VR headset (Oculus Rift, Valve Index, HTC Vive,...).

Download "zombievronehourchallenge-oculus_quest.apk" 
to get the apk for playing the game on the Oculus Quest. (you can use SideQuest to launch the apk on your quest then)
